prompt: Subject: Older Chinese couple (Eleven and The Man). Context: Outdoor porch swing during golden hour, cozy intimate setting. Action: Man reads aloud from a book; woman listens with a soft smile, head resting gently on his shoulder; swing sways slowly; both wrapped in a warm blanket. Style: Warm romantic cinematic aesthetic, soft-focus, golden tones. Camera Motion & Angle: Slow push-in from eye-level medium shot to close-up, maintaining gentle focus on their intertwined hands and faces. Composition: Medium shot transitioning to tight two-person close-up. Ambiance: Golden hour lighting, soft warm glow, conveying lifelong tender peace.
label: story
